name: In Air (Game Mechanic Test)
description:
Proof of concept of a game mechanic idea.
Made for, but never submitted to, a Christmas themed Game Jam.

Windows only.

Santa has crashed and lost his hat. All his magic is in his hat, duh.
Kick Santa's hat to keep it from touching the ground.
It looses it's powers if it does and then Christmas is ruined.
Get Santa's hat back to him, and don't let the wall of disbelief touch you...

Controls:
Move with WASD (W is jump).
Hold space while in the air to charge kick.
Release space to perform kick.
